Reviews.Title: Look just like real
Reviews.Author: Michael Li
Reviews.Content: This dummy camera costs a bit more than some other cheaper dummy camera but it's worth it.  It's look very realistic.  I have other real camera look just like this. It uses two AA batteries and the LED red light blinks every second. I just installed them a week ago and don't know how long the battery is going to last. The whole housing is made of plastic but sturdy enough.  The base and leg are metal.  Installation is very easy.

Reviews.Title: Looks same but inferior mounting bracket
Reviews.Author: I dont want a damn pen name
Reviews.Content: This camera looks like and is exactly like a similar dummy security camera sold on amazon, but look closely at the mounting bracket... this one has a metal bracket but it is very poorly engineered almost impossible to mount or adjust.. buy the other one that has a built in plastic bracket that is built into the camera.. it is outstanding.. don't buy this one..This is the one you do want:Outdoor Fake / Dummy Security Camera w/ Blinking Light (Silver)

Reviews.Title: Dummy security camera
Reviews.Author: reron
Reviews.Content: Looks authentic. Blinking red light makes people aware that the camera is active.Has helped considerably in diminishing activity in neighbor's yard.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Product
Reviews.Author: A. Cerqua
Reviews.Content: Well let's face it...this is meant to be a fake camera and it does a very good job of that.  Unless you're a criminal expert in security systems you can't tell this from the real thing.  The front is filled with fake LED's, one of which blinks red all the time.  The whole package is nicely made and very convincing.

Reviews.Title: Fine Faux Cam
Reviews.Author: chiefarchitect "chiefarchitect"
Reviews.Content: The camera looks very real and the blinking light shows up quite nicely at night.  Mounted near a doorway or entry and looking at it at very close range, it is difficult to tell it is a dummy.  Easy to install.  Plastic construction throughout so I would recommend mounting in a protective area if used outside.  Direct sunlight on the body will most likely cause the finish to dull out and eventually the plastic will crack.  Otherwise, this model is very good for indoors and limited uses in protective areas on a building's exterior.  If you do mount it outside, I would guess you would get about a year or two of use before it falls apart. I gave it a 5 star if used inside.  If used outside figure a 3 star. There is also a small label that says it is a fake cam but you can peel it off the body with no damage to the nice plastic finish.  Remove it before installing.  Burglars are getting smarter now, they can read!

Reviews.Title: A thief will think twice with this in sight
Reviews.Author: Scully Farnsworth
Reviews.Content: It looks real. For the price, I couldn't be happier.I mounted one pointing down the stairs at my girlfriends apartment. You could not miss it from the bottom of the stairs (where I also had a "Property Under Surveillance" sign). The typical thief will not risk going in for a closer look.Some tips:- Mount it where it is easily seen from the place where a would-be thief will initially see your house(the driveway/sidewalk/street, not the front porch)- Mount it high on a wall. This way, it can be seen from a distance and it cannot be easily examined closely.- You can remove the batteries if you don't like the flashing LED. I don't know how many real cameras do this.- You may want to rough-up the ball in the mount with a file or sandpaper if it won't stay in place.- Buy some stickers/signs that warn that the property is under surveillance.- Finally, consider buying a real camera if warranted.Hope this helps!

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: miss muckle
Reviews.Content: At a glance it looks like the real thing...my intention was to discourage someone looking into the entry way of the building and have them move on to another location and I think it will work.  The name "Security Man" is a little hokey but hopefully they won't get close enough to examine.  Easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Just as Advertised
Reviews.Author: A Consumer "Average Consumer"
Reviews.Content: I installed this camera at my beach house and was very pleased.  Looks real and is nicely made. The one complaint is that the position locking mechanism does not work as well as it should in that you have to really over-tighten to get it to hold the camera in position.

Reviews.Title: Good...
Reviews.Author: LilGirlNavy
Reviews.Content: Thought these were indoor/outdoor...but only indoor.  They still work however, and the mother-in-law definitely feels more secure with them outside her home.

Reviews.Title: Dumy Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Wilkerja
Reviews.Content: The security camera looks real, after two weeks the led is still blinking.  The only thing that I thought that was not great, is the swivel points doesn't tighten up very good.

Reviews.Title: Hey it was cheap, what are you expecting?
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Neff "food eater"
Reviews.Content: We installed these outside, completely unprotected from the weather, and they started to rust on the chrome base. 1 2

Reviews.Title: Great for security.
Reviews.Author: design123
Reviews.Content: After experiencing theft in my loft. I bought two of these, I've had them for at least six months.  And they work perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Benjamin
Reviews.Content: I love this product! All you have to do is bolt this onto your bathroom wall and everyone who comes over to your house will think you're a complete pervert! Nice!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: übung
Reviews.Content: I have it installed at one of our shops mixed with other reql ones and no one has noticed it.Batteries are still working after almost 2 years

Reviews.Title: does the trick
Reviews.Author: Brian K. Hartley
Reviews.Content: great product as far as looking realistic and keeping people honest for a product that is very reasonably priced and easy to install

Reviews.Title: Great fake camera!
Reviews.Author: L NEGRON
Reviews.Content: Very easy to put up yourself in a few minutes. Battery still works after a few months. I live on the ground level floor and placed them on the window frame and looks so realistic. I was impressed!

Reviews.Title: Professional Looking Equipment
Reviews.Author: valkyrie
Reviews.Content: Our home was robbed on August 24th, 2011. Come to find out we bought a home in an area of Oklahoma famous for meth-heads & burglaries. Unfortunately, the law is far and few between and stretched to their limits, so we had to take action after-the-fact to protect our home. We installed an alarm system and purchased these cameras as more of a deterent by placing one on each corner outside of our house. The neighbors took notice and can't tell whether they are real or faux (and we're not telling!). We also purchased two street signs that say, "You and Your Vehicle Are Being Monitored By Closed Circuit TV", and posted them on each side of the street. Since then the traffic down at the end of our street has been cut by 50%.We heard just today there may be a break in our case and of course, most likely the people down the street are responsible for the break-in & burglary. These cameras have been great in function and professional looking enough to help stop unwanted traffic and put these criminals on notice they are being watched. They were so affordable (a real bargain) considering how much we already lost monetarily from the break-in. I can't wait for the day when we can afford the real thing.

Reviews.Title: SecurityMan SM-3601S Dummy Indoor Camera with LED (Silver)
Reviews.Author: Roberto
Reviews.Content: As described in the website. Easy to mount. Very real......I recommend. Shipping exactly the way I asked for. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: Mikes Review
Reviews.Content: Pros:  Purchased two of these faux cams and placed them in our business as a deterent.  One is up front towards window, the other, by the rear door.  They are very realistic and seem to be doing their intended job. The flashing red light adds a nice touch.  Super easy installation.Cons:  The video surveillance stickers that came with the cams faded in less than one week.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Don't Cha'
Reviews.Content: It does the job. We have real cameras on premises, but my husband & I were looking for a little extra security. The faux camera works great, looks realistic & is more reasonably priced than others on the market. For anything more realistic, you should considering purchasing a real camera.

Reviews.Title: So realistic!
Reviews.Author: Slades "in the dark"
Reviews.Content: These "cameras" are great. Installed three of them in less than 1/2 hour. Blinking red light makes these units look very real. High quality/great design.

Reviews.Title: It Works!
Reviews.Author: R. Tolentino
Reviews.Content: Very realistic... promotes home security and deter thieves. An affordable way to secure one's property.  Just bought my second one for our backyard the first one still functions well and the battery life lasts a long time.

Reviews.Title: Looks like a toy DECEPTIVE ADVERTISING
Reviews.Author: Yale Bloor "Yale Bloor"
Reviews.Content: not sure what the other reviewers got but the camera I received was plastic and looked like a toy (LESS THAN 6 INCHES)....If your buying something to deceive a 6 yr old great, but one look at this and you will laugh, if it wasn't so cheap I would be mad...buyer beware

ProductInfo.Features:
Imitation IR LEDs and one flashing LED
Plastic material
Metal mounting bracket
Powered by 2 x AA batteries (not included)
Dimension: 80X260mm
Deter Unwanted Intruders
Metal Mounting Bracket;
Dummy Indoor Camera With Led
ProductInfo.Name: SecurityMan SM-3601S Dummy Indoor Camera with LED (Silver)
